title: Kirchhoff junction - battery resistors and W X Y Z

content.question: A battery is connected to five resistors in a circuit, as shown. Which two of the labeled locations have the same current?

choices.label: <math alttext="W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math> and <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>
<math alttext="W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math> and <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>
<math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> and <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>
<math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> and <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="W" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi></math> and <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>
